metadata.title: CVE-2021-43975 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel through 5.15.2, hw_atl_utils_fw_rpc_wait indrivers/net/ethernet/aquantia/atlantic/hw_atl/hw_atl_utils.c allows anattacker (who can introduce a crafted device) to trigger an out-of-boundswrite via a crafted length value.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
